pyproct.algorithms.random.FakeDistributionRandomAlgorithm module¶

pyproct.algorithms.random.RandomAlgorithm module¶

Created on 19/04/2012

@author: victor

class pyproct.algorithms.random.RandomAlgorithm.RandomClusteringAlgorithm(condensed_matrix, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

perform_clustering(kwargs)[source]¶

Creates a clustering where the clusters have been created by random selection of the elements in the dataset. It will create a random number of clusters if “max_num_of_clusters” is defined, or an exact number of clusters this clusters if “num_clusters” is defined.

pyproct.algorithms.random.parametersGeneration module¶

Created on 27/05/2013

@author: victor

class pyproct.algorithms.random.parametersGeneration.ParametersGenerator(parameters, matrix_handler)[source]¶

Bases: object

CLUSTERING_SIZE_STEP = 2¶
classmethod get_base_parameters()[source]¶

Defines the base parameters needed for each of the algorithms. Each parameter created will be based on one of those and must not have more keys than these.

@return: A dictionary with the base parameters for this algorithm.

get_parameters()[source]¶

This function creates some parameters to be used with the random algorithm. @return: A tuple with the generated parameters and an empty list corresponding to the clusterings.
